xwikidoc.title: Web servers test: Containers
xwikidoc.content:
{{info}}**Question:** Which of the following web servers are java servlet containers:
1. Apache HTTPD server 1. Apache Tomcat 1. Eclipse 1. Glassfish 1. IIS 1. Jetty 1. JBoss 1. nginx 1. WebLogic 1. WebSphere{{/info}}
